name: openblog
title: OpenBlog
desc: Openblog is an elegant, simple, and user-friendly blog. Focused on accessibility, SEO and performance.
article: ## Features: - Minimal styling - Mobile responsive - 100/100 Lighthouse performance - SEO-friendly with canonical URLs and OpenGraph data - Sitemap support - RSS Feed support - Markdown & MDX support - Syntax highlighting - Image optimization - Table of contents - Dark mode - Reading Time - [Pagefind](https://pagefind.app/) static search library integration - Related posts - Share posts (Linkedin, twitter) - Draft mode - Copy code block
